review: This dental clinic is in nizampet and is on the main road so visible in the heavy traffic. The hospital was very neat and tidy from inside and out. *** ******* **** *** **** **** ** ***** *****. The doctor was very gentle and patient with the people who go there. They use all the modern day equipment with well trained hands. The management of this place is also very good, they use digital database and which is very efficient and effective way these days. The doctors are really good. I recommend to go there and one can see the difference. They even explain the process to the patient which they are gonna perform

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Fillings,
review: Dr. Sitaram examined my dental problems and patiently explained various treatment options that are specific to my issues.  I am quite impressed with his vast knowledge and expertise in the field.  I entrusted him with the treatment of my fillings, broken teeth, crowns, and some other age-related dental issues.    With well-planned sittings and in about a month he restored me to a near-normal condition of dental hygiene. I am happy to say that the treatment methodology of Dr. Sitaram has been that of a meticulous Doctor, a Doctor par excellence.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I really like the approach with warm and pleasant welcome. During this covid time I was afraid of what  measures they would take since it's oral .
Dr Seetha ram kumar garu was very gentle and made sure I was comfortable all the time during surgery and explained me step by step during the process. 
During the whole procedure I wasn't scared .The environment was definitely something which kept me calm with out anxiety.
After the surgery Dr explained me the post surgery effects which are common like swelling, pain etc and about the food to be taken and about medication to comfort the pain.
As per my experience, I would definitely suggest people to consult Dr Seetha ram kumar garu for any dental problems.

tags: Value for money,
review: Very expensive. He charged rs 1000 for ****** extraction. He should have charged rs 500 but on the name of consultation he charged rs 500 but there was nothing happened in the name of consultation and for extraction he charged rs 500.  ******* ** *** *** ******* ****** *** he overcharged.
reply_text:
Consultation charges 500 and simple extraction charges 1000.
I have given discount of 500  and still you feel it is expensive then better go to government hospital for treatment instead of coming to a reputed clinic and to a dentist having 25 years of clinic experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am Damodar, visited to Dr.Seetharam. I approached to doctor as my upper RC tooth is broken and there is NO provision of fixing cap since it is broken, but treatment is done by fixing bridge. Quality of treatment and service is good. This is my third time visit. I strongly recommend if someone is looking for dental procedures.********** ** *** *** ** *** **** *******

Very friendly and kind. Responsive to all the questions and try to explain with patience to relieve of one's concerns. Got the extraction done very effectively and without much concern inspire of my early hesitation to go for extraction of tooth that was intact and immobile that decayed and needed extraction as the only option.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recommend 100%, Dr. Seetharam Garu for all dental issues. He is very experienced and provide permanent solution. He had more patience to listening patient issues and he never suggest any unnecessary medicines and tests.Facilities are:Excellent treatment. Responsible staff.Appointments are maintaining timely. So time saving.Money saving.Issues resolved permanently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hello everyoneThis is TejaI am really glad to share my experience about Dr Sunitha as well Dr Seetharam.Well coming to my problem ...My tooth on left upper jaw  got fractured five years back and the situation of that is it have to be removed actually,but I am so fortunate enough that Dr Sunita saved my tooth by RCT ...I am so so thankful to her.And recently during this pandemic ,the other tooth on the right upper jaw got fractured,this time they couldn't save the tooth since the fracture extended to root,but they were so kind enough to do the treatment during this pandemic .They have extracted my tooth with the help of some other specialist and placed an implant too. They have took utmost care. Before the treatment it was so painful for me while chewing that side but now everything is super fine.Thanks to both the doctors for their hard work and utmost careBy God's grace I am in hands of good dental doctors,so no worries about my teeth

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
